mapper.select: SELECT mem.userid, userpw, username, userphone, useremail, enabled, regdate, updatedate, auth FROM tbl_member mem LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_member_auth auth on mem.userid = auth.userid WHERE mem.userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: insert all into tbl_member (userid, userpw, username, userphone, useremail) values (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{userName}, #{userphone}, #{useremail}) into tbl_member_auth (userid, auth) values (#{userid}, 'ROLE_USER') select * from sys.dual
mapper.update: update tbl_member set username = #{userName}, userphone = #{userphone}, useremail = #{useremail} where userid = #{userid}
